Metadata.Notes: The original start address was $02A7. Therefore the code here has been moved to $07B0 to keep it above the dump start address of $0400.
Metadata.ExomizerCommand: exomizer sfx 0x07B0 "IKPLUS-07B0-0800" -Di_irq_exit=0 -s "lsr $d011" -f "w1: bit $d011 bpl w1 w2: bit $d011 bmi w2 jsr $fda3 rol $d011" -x "inc $d020" -o "IK+-[ex].prg"
